Setup
=====

Requirements
------------

- numpy
- scipy v1.2.1
- pandas
- emcee
- lightkurve
- astropy
- pymc3
- statsmodels v0.9.0
- corner

Installation
------------

Clone the GitHub repo with

.. code-block:: console

    $ git clone https://github.com/grd349/PBjam.git

or with pip

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install https://github.com/grd349/PBjam.git
